doc.description:
Model View Controller Class
 *
 *
This class will route a request to the according model and/or view through its controller.
A model and a view can be automatically associated if located in the same directory branch with the same name than the controller in their respective locations
A view can be directly imported in the controller through this very class

tags.todo: Look into the check function and divide it

name: bbn\Mvc\Model

__construct.name: __construct
__construct.summary: Models are always recreated and reincluded, even if they have from the same path
__construct.description: They are all created from bbn\Mvc::get_model

arguments.name: db
arguments.description: The full path to the model's file

checkAction.name: checkAction

isControlledBy.name: isControlledBy

get.name: get

getContent.name: getContent
getContent.summary: This will get a the content of a file located within the controller data path.

getModel.name: getModel
getModel.summary: This will get the model. There is no order for the arguments.

getCachedModel.name: getCachedModel
getCachedModel.summary: This will get the cached model. There is no order for the arguments.

getPluginModel.name: getPluginModel
getPluginModel.summary: Retrieves a model of a the plugin.

getSubpluginModel.name: getSubpluginModel
getSubpluginModel.summary: Get a sub plugin model (a plugin inside the plugin directory of another plugin).

hasSubpluginModel.name: hasSubpluginModel
hasSubpluginModel.summary: Returns true if the subplugin model exists.

hasPlugin.name: hasPlugin
hasPlugin.summary: Returns true if plugin exists and false otherwise.

isPlugin.name: isPlugin
isPlugin.summary: Returns true if plugin exists and false otherwise.

pluginPath.name: pluginPath
pluginPath.summary: Returns the path of the given plugin.

pluginUrl.name: pluginUrl
pluginUrl.summary: Returns the URL part of the given plugin.

addInc.name: addInc
addInc.summary: Adds a property to the MVC object inc if it has not been declared.

hasData.name: hasData
hasData.summary: Checks if data exists or if a specific index exists in the data

setData.name: setData
setData.summary: Sets the data. Chainable. Should be useless as $this->data is public. Chainable.

addData.name: addData
addData.summary: Merges the existing data if there is with this one. Chainable.

setCache.name: setCache
setCache.summary: Sets a cache from the given data.

deleteCache.name: deleteCache
deleteCache.summary: Deletes a cache with the given data.

getFromCache.name: getFromCache
getFromCache.summary: Returns the cache for the given item, but if expired or absent creates it before by running the closure.

getSetFromCache.name: getSetFromCache
getSetFromCache.summary: Returns the cache for the given item, but if expired or absent creates it before by running the provided function.

test.name: test
test.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

parent.name: test
parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

check.name: check
check.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

parent.name: check
parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

parent.name: log

__call.name: __call

parent.name: __call

pluginDataPath.name: pluginDataPath

doc.description: An external object that can be filled after the object creation and can be used as a global with the function add_inc
